summary: Add support for UUID objects in the PHP SDK marshaller. Currently users must manually cast UUID objects to strings when generating, passing in activities, or receiving as results.
userImpact: Users need to manually cast UUID objects to strings, adding unnecessary boilerplate code.
proposedFix: Implement optional typecasters for UUID objects using ramsey/uuid or symfony/uid libraries that are only activated if the respective library is installed.
workaround: Manually cast UUID objects to strings before passing to activities or returning as results.
resolutionDetails: Implemented UUID marshaller support with optional dependency handling for ramsey/uuid library.
keyQuote: Users use UUID a lot: generate like a side effect, pass in activities, get as results. Right now users must cast UUID objects to string manually.
